data.text: Love righteousness, ye that be judges of the earth,
Because he is found of them that tempt him not,
For crooked thoughts separate from God;
Because wisdom will not enter into a soul that deviseth evil,
For a holy spirit of discipline will flee deceit.
For Some authorities read the spirit of wisdom is loving to man.  wisdom is a spirit that loveth man,
Because the spirit of the Lord hath filled Gr. the inhabited earth.  the world,
Therefore no man that uttereth unrighteous things shall be unseen;
For in the midst of  his counsels the ungodly shall be searched out;
Because there is  an ear of jealousy that  listeneth to all things,
Court not death in the error of your life;
For he created all things that they might have being:
But ungodly men by their hands and their words called Or, Hades Gr. him.  death unto them:
